title: bladder tumor procured UVA1
extract_protocol_ch1: Total RNA was extracted using an RNeasy kit, per manufacturer instructions (Qiagen, Valencia, CA, USA).
label_protocol_ch1: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 microg total RNA.
hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 microg of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Human Genome Array HG-U133 Plus 2.0. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
scan_protocol: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix Scanner 3000.
description: snap-frozen bladder tumors procured intraoperatively and profiled for gene expression
data_processing: RMA, using its standard settings as implemented in the Bioinformatics Suite commercially available as an add on for Matlab R2009B, (The Mathworks, Natick, MA).
